00072 #include <DAVE3.h>

00075 /*******************************************************************************
00076 **                      Private Macro Definitions                             **
00077 *******************************************************************************/
00078 /* Invalid Input */
00079 #define RCU_INVALID_INPUT  0x0000000FU
00080 
00081 #define RCU_SET   1U
00082 
00083 #define RCU_RESET   0U
00084 
00085 #define CLEAR_BITMASK   0xF0000000U
00086 
00087 #define RESET_BITMASK   0x0FFFFFFFU
00088 
00093 /*******************************************************************************
00094 **                      Public Function Definitions                           **
00095 *******************************************************************************/
00096 
00097 
00102  /* This function is to enable reset of peripheral by software  */
00103  
00104  void RESET001_AssertReset(RESET001_ResetnType Resetn)
00105  {
00106   uint32_t* RCUControlReg = 0 ;
00107   uint32_t Temp = 0 ;
00108   /* <<<DD_RESET001_API_1>>> */
00109   SCU_RESET_TypeDef* RCUCtrlReg = SCU_RESET;
00110   Temp = ((uint32_t)Resetn & CLEAR_BITMASK) >> 28;
00111   RCUControlReg = (uint32_t*)((uint32_t)(&RCUCtrlReg->PRSET0) + ( 0x0000000CU * Temp));
00112   *RCUControlReg = ((uint32_t)Resetn & RESET_BITMASK );
00113 }
00114 
00115 /* API to get the  reason of last reset */      
00116 
00117 void RESET001_DeassertReset(RESET001_ResetnType Resetn)
00118 {
00119   uint32_t* RCUControlReg = 0;
00120   uint32_t Temp = 0;
00121   /* <<<DD_RESET001_API_2>>> */
00122   SCU_RESET_TypeDef* RCUCtrlReg = SCU_RESET;  
00123   Temp = ((uint32_t)Resetn & CLEAR_BITMASK) >> 28;
00124   RCUControlReg = (uint32_t*)((uint32_t)(&RCUCtrlReg->PRCLR0) + ( 0x0000000CU * Temp));
00125   *RCUControlReg = ((uint32_t)Resetn & RESET_BITMASK) ;
00126 }
00127         
00128 /* API to get the  reason of last reset. */
00129 RESET001_InfoType RESET001_GetResetInfo()
00130 {
00131   SCU_RESET_TypeDef* RCUCtrlReg = SCU_RESET;
00132  /* <<<DD_RESET001_API_4>>> */
00133   return (RCUCtrlReg->RSTSTAT  &  SCU_RESET_RSTSTAT_RSTSTAT_Msk);
00134 }
00135                 
00136 /* Get the reset status of the peripheral */            
00137 status_t RESET001_GetStatus(RESET001_ResetnType Resetn)
00138 {
00139   uint32_t status = RCU_INVALID_INPUT;
00140   uint32_t* RCUControlReg = 0;
00141   uint32_t Temp = 0 ;
00142   uint32_t Getstatus = 0;
00143   /* <<<DD_RESET001_API_3>>> */
00144   SCU_RESET_TypeDef* RCUCtrlReg = SCU_RESET;
00145   Temp = ((uint32_t)Resetn & CLEAR_BITMASK) >> 28;      
00146   RCUControlReg = (uint32_t*)((uint32_t)(&RCUCtrlReg->PRSTAT0) + ( 0x0000000CU * Temp));
00147   Getstatus      = (*RCUControlReg) & (uint32_t)Resetn & RESET_BITMASK ;                         
00148   if(Getstatus != 0)
00149   {
00150           status = RCU_SET;
00151   }
00152   else
00153   {
00154           status = RCU_RESET;
00155   }
00156   return status;
00157 }
